snippet: Ethics investigators said that Representative Vern Buchanan appeared to have tried to illegally influence the testimony of an ex-business partner regarding allegations of campaign finance violations.
abstract: Board overseeing the Office of Congressional Ethics releases a report finding that Florida Rep Vernon G Buchanan tried to illegally influence the testimony of a former business partner, Sam Kazran, regarding allegations of campaign finance violations in his own race; Buchanan leads House Republican fund-raising operations nationwide.
lead_paragraph: Ethics investigators said that Representative Vern Buchanan appeared to have tried to illegally influence the testimony of an ex-business partner regarding allegations of campaign finance violations.

headline.seo: Ethics Inquiry Casts Harsh Light on Vern Buchanan
headline.main: Report Casts Harsh Light on Lawmaker’s Fund-Raising
headline.print_headline: Report Casts Harsh Light on Lawmaker’s Fund-Raising
